# The `WebAssemblyWasmObjectWriter.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file handles Wasm-specific object emission, converting LLVM&#39;s internal fixups into the appropriate relocations. <a href="#details">More...</a>
